TopicTitle: Can't collect data from SC-9001 Science Jr or...

Articles.Content:
I Can't collect data from SC-9001 Science Jr or the Mystery Goo container. I tested most other science equipment and they seem to work fine. also, I was using a scientist to try to collect.

I'd add my mod list, but I don't know how

It's a feature of the the SETI tech tree.

- MaterialsBay and MysteryGoo can not be collected, but can still be reset by scientists (so you can use them multiple times, if you transmit)
I m kind of looking forward to KSP 1.1, when I toss all of the rebalancing stuff out of the SETIctt download ;-).

Well that answers that. Thanks!
It is indeed a feature of SETI. A clever feature to to give a bit of a technician challenge that is more realistic. You can however easily bypass it using the For Science mod. Ships Manifest also works. Both letting you move science to the main capsule. With different restrictions. So there are other choices and challenges if you prefer to change this feature. Edited September 7, 2015 by nobodyhasthis
